About Us

About Us

We are more than just an investment banking firm, we provide a comprehensive suite of services to assist our clients with a one stop shop for all their IPO and marketing needs. We work with start up firms and fortune 500 companies.

We believe that we are the only independently owned Investment banking firm to offer in house PR/IR, Print, online & billboard marketing, Celebrity endorsements, Debt/equity capital raising, underwriting and ongoing regulatory filing services in America.

Robertson private Investment Group can list your company on many exchanges including; London Stock Exchange, Frankfurt Stock Exchange, Nasdaq, OTC:BB, OTC:QB, Pink Sheets and many others.

If you would like to go public you will be guided by our team of experienced professionals every step of the way.

Investor introductions We have very strong relationships with some of the Largest institutional investment funds in the USA. We can assist with raising capital for debt or equity no matter how big or small your need for funding.

Broker dealers Our team of licensed professionals can provide our clients with a turn key broker/dealer, registered with FINRA and at least two clearing houses. We can re-structure books of business and assist with financing.

For a free consultation or if you would like additional information on the going public process please contact us.

We can communicate in:

English, Spanish, Farsi, German, Hebrew, French, Italian and Cantonese.
